abstract: Initialize Doc Detective in a repository by detecting documentation, generating minimal configuration, creating tests for identified procedures, and iteratively running and fixing tests with confidence-based suggestions. Supports interactive and CI modes.

interactive.description: Guided setup with prompts and confirmations

auto-fix.description: Apply all test fixes regardless of confidence

fix-threshold.description: Confidence percentage threshold for auto-applying fixes

dry-run.description: Show planned changes without applying them
